OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'flashpoint'.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

SILOBREAKER_API_URL.description: The URL of the Silobreaker API.

SILOBREAKER_API_KEY.description: The API key for the Silobreaker API.

SILOBREAKER_API_SHARED.description: The shared secret for the Silobreaker API.

SILOBREAKER_LISTS.description: The lists of Silobreaker to import.

SILOBREAKER_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: The start date for importing Silobreaker data.

SILOBREAKER_INTERVAL.description: The interval in minutes for importing Silobreaker data.
